description: The slow cooker does all the hard work to make this pear and almond cake perfectly every time.
name: Slow Cooker Pear & Almond Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add a piece of parchment paper to the slow cooker (without touching the batter) and place the lid on to secure. Cook on low for 3 hours. Turn off the heat and leave to sit for 30 minutes before turning out on to a serving plate.
